tooltipText:
You build Courage through your valiant actions in combat, increasing your physical mitigation by 0.15% per point. Courage may also be spent on certain abilities and effects for other unique advantages on the battlefield.

Weapon combo finishers and extended finishers generate 20 Courage and apply 5 stacks of Staggered to targets hit. Taking damage also generates Courage based on amount of incoming damage.

You passively generate more threat against targets you deal damage to.
name: Tank_Passive_Courageous
